name: Hugo III: Jungle of Doom
description:
All new for '93, JUNGLE OF DOOM is the third fully animated adventure game in the now legendary Hugo series. This time, Hugo and his ever-faithful sidekick Penelope must escape from a treacherous South American jungle.

With eye-popping, state-of-the-art graphics rivaling anything at the video arcade, JUNGLE OF DOOM is destined for software superstardom.

Don't miss it!
